name: Wave Dash
description:
Wave Dash is a space shooter where you must fight incoming space figthers, Seems simple right? However when you kill a enemy fighter their nuclear core explodes and you must do your best to manouver away from the shockwave created by the blast. While fighting waves of enemy interceptors you can loot health kits and xp to fill your energy bar. When full you can unleash a powerfull shockwave. After every round you can choose to upgrade your ships speed, hp or shockwave

Game was made during the jamDNA 11 game jam
